UserAccount.title: UserAccount
UserAccount.description: Stores user account information for the TramitesFacil app.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserAccount entity.

email.description: User's email address for login and communication.

creationDate.description: Date and time when the user account was created.

ServiceRequest.title: ServiceRequest
ServiceRequest.description: Represents a service request made by a user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the request.

serviceId.description: The ID of the requested service.

serviceName.description: The name of the requested service.

status.description: The current status of the request.

requestDate.description: The date the request was made.

fileUrl.description: URL of the completed document PDF uploaded by the admin.

formData.description: Key-value pairs of the data submitted by the user for the service request.

definition.description: Stores user account information. Path-based ownership ensures that only the user can access their own data.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Stores all service requests from users. Admins can read/write all, users can only read their own.

params.name: requestId
params.description: The unique identifier for the service request.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore structure is designed to support the TramitesFacil app, focusing on user account management and service requests. The primary goal is to ensure secure and scalable data management. Path-based ownership for user accounts ensures straightforward security rules. The serviceRequests collection stores all transaction-like data, allowing admins to manage them while users can only view their own.
